TopicTitle: Flag Decals on the Side of Fuel Tanks?

Articles.Content:
So I'm seeing the ARM update videos and pictures.. And there's a NASA Logo on the Fuel Tanks. Which I really hope is optional. BEFORE I'm attacked, I love NASA. They're great. But I'm playing KERBAL Space Program, and I think the inclusion of a real space agency in game is illusion breaking. So anyone know if it's optional? Or feel like I do?

Also after seeing that I thought it would be cool if WE chose the flag/decal that goes on the fuel tanks and boosters. So the flag you made or chose is on your rockets. You want the NASA flag you can have a NASA Flag, but if you want a Kerbal flag you can give yourself a cool rocket with Jeb's wild grin on it. That's my two cents. Thanks all!

I hope this may be an answer are you looking for !

  • Flags can be shown via tweakables on specific parts
